New Records: Nick Castellanos homered in his first at bat, drew a two-out walk and scored the winning run in his penultimate plate appearance
Key Match Events: Nick Castellanos made a lunging catch in right field to prevent the tying run from reaching base in the top of the eighth
Nick Castellanos was plunked again in the bottom of the eighth
Weston Wilson drove in the game-winning run
Pre-Game Insights: Kevin Cash apologized to Nick Castellanos before the game
Post-Match Reflections: Nick Castellanos appreciated Cash's apology and respect for his honesty
The Phillies are flourishing as a team right now, reaching 30 games over.500 for the first time all season
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Phillies swept the Rays and trimmed their magic number to win their first N.L. East crown since 2011 down to nine
The winning run was driven in by a reserve player for the third straight game
Others: The Phillies will face the New York Mets for the first time since the London series in June
